programme.title: Snowman's Pass
programme.desc: Still struggling to accept her fianc's death in a rock climbing accident, mountain guide DIANA PENNINGTON gratefully accepts industrialist CURT SEAVER's offer to find the body using a new satellite imagery technology his company has developed. But while traversing the legendary "Snowman's Pass" with Curt and his companions HUGO and TYLER, Diana is horrified to discover the search for her fianc is a decoy they are in fact hunting for a fallen spy satellite, property of an enemy foreign power.

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: A woman travels from Los Angeles to Seattle to try to prevent her sister from going to prison for murder.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: On a rescue mission, the USS Enterprise is attacked by Krall, a warlord sworn against the Federation. Crashed on an uncharted world, the crew must join forces with Jaylah, a rebellious alien warrior, to escape and stop Krall from triggering all-out war.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: I Walk Alone
programme.desc: After taking the rap for his partner, a mobster is released from prison to find his former partner entranched in a swank night club with no intention of sharing the riches.

programme.title: Houdini
programme.desc: Tony Curtis gives a winning performance as the great Houdini, the struggling circus performer who emerged as the world's most captivating magician and escape artist.

programme.title: Airplane vs. Volcano
programme.desc: When an airplane is trapped in a ring of erupting volcanoes, the passengers must survive without landing.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: American Yakuza
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen ("Green Book") stars as an undercover FBI agent who has risen through the ranks of the Yakuza and now finds himself caught in a war between the Yakuza, the mob and the FBI.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a journalist (Justin Timberlake) joins forces with his editor (Morgan Freeman) and a renowned private detective (Kevin Spacey) to bring the force down.

programme.title: Ecstasy Of Order: The Tetris Master
programme.desc: Follows a group of record-holding Tetris players as they prepare to compete in the 2010 Classic Tetris World Championship.

programme.title: Red Heaven
programme.desc: In preparation for the first human mission to Mars, six volunteers take part in the ultimate dress rehearsal, living inside a year-long NASA simulation

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: From executive producer Denis Leary, BURN is an action-packed documentary about Detroit told through the eyes of firefighters charged with the task of saving a city that many have written off.

programme.title: Chop & Steele
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Joe Pickett and Nick Prueher, two comedians famous for pranking local news stations on live television as the fake strongman duo 'Chop & Steele,' find themselves in federal court with a vengeful media conglomerate after their latest morning show stunt goes viral.

programme.title: Cries of Desire
programme.desc: Jermaine an aspiring male model controls his wife Ariel until a terrible accident invites a dangerous affair.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Coming home for the holidays is something most families cherish. After this holiday, Christmas will never be the same in the Higher-Mills family. Coming from mixed backgrounds, adopted siblings Smythe, Hanna, Bea, Shane, and Lonny along with their parents, Pat and Samantha, try to navigate their changing family and reunite during the holiday season.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Lancaster: Host Crystal Powell travels Dallas and tours historic Lancaster, Texas. Crystal takes you on a soulful and wholesome journey to family-owned and operated Casserole Soul Caf. Followed by a snip from Crystal's stand-up special at SXSW!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get hyped and head over with us to The Coaches Box in Duncanville, Texas, a Dallas suburb known for it's local sports legacy. Owner and operator Reginald Heath takes you on a journey to goal-winning and high-scoring delicious home-cooked fresh food alongside comedian D. Elli$.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Crystal is joined by local comedian Bryson Brown in Austin, Texas where they head down to the historic and celebrated Victory Grill. A local staple that hosted the likes of Billie Holiday and James Brown. Crystal partakes in local history and delicious shrimp and grits for this modern spin on brunch. Then, Crystal and Bryson bring the laughs with a special performance in Austin.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Feelin Okay? You will when Crystal take you through her sit down at Mr. A Ok's in San Antonio, Texas. We sit down with owner Cindy Kirk, whose father Mr. Alvis Kirk (Mr. A-OK) was the inspiration behind the restaurant. Cindy and her husband, chef Steven Harris, bring soul food and southern comfort including Fried Ribs, Chicken Fried Steak, and Oxtail to the San Antonio community. Then we're joined by local comedian Leah Sampson for laughs and a sit-down lunch!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get ready for some island vibes, as Crystal takes you down to Houston where we're introduced to Just Oxtails in Missouri City, Texas. Locally owned and operated, Just Oxtails has been a local staple for the last twenty years where they've built a brand on Just Oxtails! Then we're joined by comedienne Lotto Marie who brings the laughs about her mid-west upbringing.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Continuing our tour of Missouri City in Houston, Texas, Crystal takes us to Micheaux's a local restaurant that made a name for themselves during the pandemic by giving back to the community through their Everybody Eats program. Owner Mr. Mischeaux serves up traditional southern Louisiana family recipes that include their signature Salmon, Five Cheese Macaroni & Cheese, and Peach Cobbler. Then, Crystal is joined by local comic Lady Rico for joyful tasting, followed by a return to the Bodega with a special set from Lady Rico.

programme.title: Thanksgiving With The Carters
programme.desc: A family tries to find common ground with its newest members, as they honor their tradition of Thanksgiving surprise, where each person attempts to surprise the family with something unique and positive.

programme.title: Falling for Christmas
programme.desc: When champion figure skater Claire becomes injured she is sent to a rehabilitation center in the snowy mountains where she meets and falls for a local ice fisherman who shows her there is more to life than competition.

programme.title: The Merry In-laws
programme.desc: After Alex gets engaged to Peter, she goes to meet his parents for the first time, not knowing they are actually Santa and Mrs. Claus.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young woman who comes from a life of privilege falls for the owner of a soup kitchen after discovering a Dear Santa letter written by his seven year old daughter.

programme.title: Duffy
programme.desc: Duffy is a cunning aristocrat of criminals who is hired by Stefane, a young playboy, to hijack a boat carrying several million dollars of his father's fortune. The plot succeeds, with a little help from Segolene, Stefane's girlfriend - but also with an unexpected, sudden turn of events.

programme.title: Who's Minding The Mint?
programme.desc: A clerk who works in the mint in Washington, DC accidentally destroys $50,000 in cash, and attempts to sneak into the building in the middle of the night and run off enough cash on the presses to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A U.S. Army tank crew joins a band of stragglers in a desperate search for water in the war-torn North African desert.

programme.title: Let's Do It Again
programme.desc: A couple faces divorce after a wife's plan to teach her unfaithful husband a lesson backfires.

programme.title: The Man Who Loved Women
programme.desc: A charming and romantic comedy about a man who never met a woman he couldn't love. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: In a world where winning means survival, they broke the only rule... they fell in love.

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: Fresh Horses
programme.desc: A safely conservative college senior meets a country girl who changes the course of his life.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy evades the law as he hunts for the real killer.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: An ex-soldier's plans to move east are delayed after his brother is murdered on the orders of a land baron.

programme.title: Beyond the Sacramento
programme.desc: Gunfire and lawlessness rule the land in California until "Wild Bill Hickok" (Bill Elliott) comes along to clean it up. Fast action and plenty of fighting in this western which has Elliott saving a frontier town from Bradley Page and Frank LaRue.

programme.title: Desert Vigilante
programme.desc: Charles Starrett stars as a federal agent assigned to stop the illegal flow of silver from Mexico into the U.S. The lawman soon figures out that the local U.S. attorney, Tristram Coffin, is in cahoots with the smugglers. After a few chases and shootouts, Starrett fulfills his mission.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: Two backstabbing deserters steal a Gatling Gun from their cavalry unit to attack an Apache tribe and steal their gold. They get help from a naive pacifist pastor. Meanwhile, both the cavalry and the Apache go after them - and the Gun.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A lively old lady arrives in town hot on the trail of a notorious bandit and the reward money for capturing him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A doctor seeks revenge on the man he blames for ruining his practice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance run into trouble while transporting a captured killer back to face trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a man, eerily similar to a man he killed, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas is in Wyoming on the trail of a gang illegally selling weapons to the Indians, Mark stays with Miss Milly, where he suffers from loneliness and doubt with his father gone for 2 months.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, Mark and Micah tangle with the Newman family and learn the secret of a town's 20-year-old mystery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Blinded in an explosion, Lucas fights despair as he prepares for a meeting with a gun-toting enemy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.

programme.title: Part-time Spy
programme.desc: Government official goes undercover to a phishing group to retrieve budget, where she meets an undercover cop.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: During the Korean War, Second Lieutenant Sang-Yeol encounters a group of orphans while leading his platoon. Empathizing with their pain, he makes a choir with the children to protect them.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing VIP
programme.desc: Top National Security agent and zoophobe Tae-ju suddenly receives an ability to talk to the animals after a freak accident.

programme.title: The Recon
programme.desc: One day at early dawn, a search unit near the DMZ, the front line, is on alert. It was because a soldier from another unit's GP ran away to DMZ with a gun. Under Commander Baek, the 3rd platoon members led by First Lieutenant Cho are put into the operation to arrest the deserter. The search begins, and at the same time, First Lieutenant Lim's dead body is found at the unit's official residence. The accident is reported to the Division Headquarters and Captain Kang, who is about to be discharged, arrives at the search unit with an army surgeon. The commander and the army surgeon are rushing to conclude Lim's case with suicide, but Kang suspects that there is a deep secret in this accident. At that time, the soldiers who were put into the operations get killed one by one, and the dark truth between Lim's death and the deserter search operation is revealed.

programme.desc: The Prismatic World Tour is a sensory explosion of eye-popping theatrics, daring acrobatics and of course, all the hits. This concert film is a visually stunning production that captures Katy's fun-loving personality and artistic vision. Spanning the entire length of the arena floor, the innovative Prismatic tour stage allows Katy to share intimate moments with her fans in a unique shared connection with the music. Directed for the stage in seven thematic acts, this unmissable spectacle features hit after hit after hit. The World Tour captures the excitement, color and energy of the live Katy Perry extravaganza.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: In the second half of the 18th Century, the island of Antigua in the West Indies played a critical role in British Naval supremacy. It was the second largest British port, after London, and was run by none other than Lord Admiral Nelson. We visit Antigua to see what life was like for British sailors, and we cook at the oldest Sugar Plantation in Antigua, Betty's Hope.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: St. Lucia played a critical role in winning the American Revolution, when the British stationed in St. Lucia missed seeing French ships leave Martinique, headed for Yorktown, VA. We visit St. Lucia, and discover an island with a magical mixture of Indian, African, French and British cultures, and explore the rainforests where cacao, bananas and other tropical delights grow.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: Rum was so valuable in the 18th Century, that it was often preferred over money as currency. Rum was the key ingredient in the Triangle Trade that exchanged guns, gold and slaves for this precious liquid. We travel to Guyana to see how Rum is made, and to explore the legend of El Dorado, the city of gold. Chef Staib cooks traditional Guyanan dishes using local ingredients.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino

programme.desc: Chef Stellino shares his sauce making secrets, to inspire the viewers with this elegant and sophisticated Mango and Ginger sauce that is easy to make and tastes delicious! He also shares some important fact about the uniqueness of the Black cod and his step by step secrets on how to plate this dish with the refined elegance of a professional chef.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: Chef Stellino reconnects with his Italian roots as he guides the viewer through some simple and exciting techniques on how to make traditional Italian pasta dishes with the elegance and panache of an Italian born chef, with a plateful of tips, techniques and ideas to help anyone improve their style and performance in the kitchen.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table

Locals pride themselves on the produce cultivated from the land and nearby sea. Celebrated chef and culinary ambassador Miguel Taniyama takes Pati to the best markets, street food stands, and restaurants. In her kitchen, Pati creates recipes inspired by the experience.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: Altata, Hidden Gem by the Sea of Cortez

Pati meets locals and chefs as the town embarks on a journey to reinvent itself from sleepy fishing village to tourist destination. She takes a boat ride to sample fresh oysters right from the water and visits restaurants serving fresh seafood. At home, Pati prepares a seafood feast based on the bountiful waters of the Altata Bay.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati heads to Los Mochis, a coastal city in the northern region of Sinaloa that was founded by Americans in the late 1800s. programme.title: Breakdowns and Beatdowns

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Before the challenge begins, the designers are asked to re-pick their teams. Then, in teams of two, the designers are tasked with making a prom dress out of duct tape. In addition to the Runway, they are also judged on their work by a group of high school students, whose votes factor into their final score. Two designers are eliminated.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Regrouping once again, the judges decide which designers they would like to see work together, and the teams are separated into two teams of four. The designers must make cohesive looks for the male dance troupe Thunder From Down Under. Not only must they execute menswear, but their designs must be able to tear away onstage as part of their performance.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: In new teams of twos and threes, the designers make a ready-to-wear look for Lord and Taylor, inspired by their famous rose design. The winning design is manufactured and sold at Lord and Taylor for Spring 2013.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: In pairs again, the designers use HP technology and inspiration drawn from the Guggenheim Museum to create two looks: one avant-garde and a second ready-to-wear piece. They are also able to design their fabric for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: After working in teams all season, the designers are relieved when they receive the news that they will now be working on their own. However, some of the eliminated designers return to act as assistants and help the competitors complete their look. For this challenge, the designers must make a Spring 2013 editorial look to be worn by actress Jordana Brewster and featured in Marie Claire.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: The remaining designers are paired with new assistants and each sent to a European fashion capital: Paris, Barcelona, London, and Berlin. One unlucky designer stays in NYC. The designers must draw inspiration from their city, as well as purchase their materials there. Upon returning to NYC, they must create a look for the judges that will prove they have what it takes to design a collection for Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: Weak and weary from their journey, the few designers left say goodbye to NYC and return to their respective hometowns to begin working on their final collections. Tim Gunn travels to visit the designers and assess their progress. In the end, all four remaining designers must present their three best pieces to the judging panel, as the judges are left to decide who will move on to show at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.
